document.full_text: china will evacuate citizens from areas worst affected by japan's earthquake and subsequent damage to nuclear reactors, but has detected no abnormal radiation levels at home, the government said on tuesday.
document.title: china to evacuate citizens from japan quake areas
lines_and_colors: china will evacuate citizens from areas worst affected by japan's earthquake and subsequent damage to nuclear reactors, but has detected no abnormal radiation levels at home, the government said on tuesday.
